text: İlter Türkmen (8 November 1927 – 6 July 2022) was a Turkish politician. He was born in Istanbul, Turkey. He was the minister of foreign affairs from 1980 to 1983. Türkmen died on 6 July 2022 in Istanbul at the age of 94.Eski Dışişleri Bakanı İlter Türkmen hayatını kaybetti ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Turkish politicians
title: İlter Türkmen
